name: DragSox®
description: DragSox® is the ultimate resistance training device designed to increase and maximize power, endurance, strength and speed in a swimmer's kick, enhancing overall performance. Its unique design allows the swimmer to maintain natural body position and balance with complete freedom of movement. It is also an effective cross-training tool for bikers, runners, triathletes and water polo players. DragSox® are one size fits all. They come in 3 degrees of resistance: 30-introductory, 45-hard and 60-hardest. We highly recommend starting with the 30 or 45. How to care for DragSox®: Rinse them with fresh water after each practice and hang them in the shade to drip dry. Do not wring out or leave in sunlight for an extended period of time. Shipping: USPS Priority Mail. 2-3 business days within the USA, 3-4 weeks for International. EU customers can place orders through our EU distributor to save on shipping and to reduce delivery time. For team discounts, please contact us at info@aquavolo.com or text us at 415-322-8656. We can give you a discount code for use as a team or for your swimmers to order individually. See what teams are training with DragSox®: http://aquavolo.com/community

name: VoloBlades™
description: VoloBlades™ are made in the USA. VoloBlades™ are palm paddles, uniquely designed to improve stroke technique by focusing energy in the lower palm, during the catch phase, fully engaging the core and large muscle groups. The result is a more powerful and efficient stroke. Both a strengthening as well as self-correcting tool, it can be used for all strokes, promoting excellent form (for more detailed explanation please read this post.) What size VoloBlades should I use? The smaller VB45’s are great for drills and working on basic technique. They can be used for the entire workout, helping swimmers fine tune their feel for the water, promoting a more efficient stroke. VB60’s are larger and great for power sets. They provide more resistance during the pull phase, developing power and strength. Shipping: USPS Priority Mail. 2-3 business days within the USA, 3-4 weeks for International. Note: For an added dimension to your power training, check out ZB weights to complement VoloBlades. ZB weights are sold separately. International shipping available. For team discounts, please contact us at info@aquavolo.com or text us at 415-322-8656. We can give you a discount code for use as a team or for your swimmers to order individually.

name: ZB weights™
description: We have created a system of weights to complement VoloBlades*. ZB weights are sold as an accessory to VoloBlades. In order to use them they must be paired with VoloBlades*. ZB weights are made from an industrial grade high density felt that absorbs water, and adds weight to our paddles during above water recovery. Underwater, ZB weights maintain a neutral buoyancy and provide drag without adding any effective weight -- just like DragSox! VoloBlades* plus ZB weights create a cycle of weight and drag throughout a swimmer's stroke, making for a great upper-body power training tool while promoting excellent technique. Are there Different sizes? Yes, ZB weights come in 2 sizes, 1/4" and 1/2" thickness. The 1/4" is about 3oz when wet, 1/2" is about 6oz. Shipping: USPS Priority Mail. 2-3 business days within the USA, 3-4 weeks for International. *Note: ZB weights are sold as an accessory to VoloBlades. In order to use them they must be paired with VoloBlades, AquaVolo's palm paddles. VoloBlades are sold separately. How to care for ZB weights: Rinse or soak ZB weights in clean fresh water after each use. If you have a suit spinner at your pool, put your ZBs in there and give them a spin. Hang them from a clothesline or hanger by hooking them through one of the bottom holes to let them dry. International shipping available. For team discounts, please contact us at info@aquavolo.com or text us at 415-322-8656. We can give you a discount code for use as a team or for your swimmers to order individually.

name: Touch n' Turn
description: The Touch n’ Turn wall is our solution to training swimmers for quick open turns. In pools with gutters, teaching proper open turns is very challenging. Young swimmers have a tendency to grab the gutter wall instead of doing a touch and turn. Whatever the reason, the bottom line is a slower turn. The best swimmers have perfected their turns to the point where they can use the walls and the speed of their turns to catch and even pass the competition! The TnT wall is a light weight, mobile wall that blocks access to the gutter, encouraging swimmers to practice their open turns properly. Perfecting this skill will help them use the walls to their advantage! Touch n' Turn Instructions
